title: Ford Earnings Reflect Grinding Car Market Beat, Impacting Stock Price

scene_plan.wide_context: A montage of the automotive industry, showing various car models and Ford's place within it.

scene_plan.impact_close: Cut to a graph displaying slow growth in sales figures with corresponding stock price fluctuations for Ford over recent months.

scene_plan.data_overlay: Text overlay of key statistics from the earnings report, highlighting challenges and supply chain concerns.

sora_prompt.voiceOver: @lee627 narrates calmly: 'Ford's latest quarter reflects a grinding car market. Despite slow growth affecting all players, Ford is adapting with an EV strategy.'
sora_prompt.quiet_outro: The screen fades to black as the camera pans out from inside a quiet newsroom setting.
